Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a fish and label it.
The student can draw and label the water environment where fish live (e.g., lake, river, ocean).
The student can draw and label other plants and animals that live in the same water environment as the fish.
The student can illustrate and label the resources that fish need to live (e.g., water, food).
The student can show and label how the fish and other living things are part of a system in their habitat.
